name: Car Salesman Dating Simulator
description:
If the steering wheel is missing just ignore it.

There are a total of 8 endings, some are harder to reach than others. I would consider one to be a "secret" ending. Sometimes you might have to reach for the same ending you got previously but choose different options...If that makes sense.

Sound Effects, Music, and Images used in this game are credited to: Gaming Sound FX, Sound Effect, Kevin MacLeod, Dave Porter, and Stock Images.

&

This is a very jarring game at least that's how I would describe it. It's less of a Dating Simulator and more of a Listen to the salesman talk and respond accordingly, with dating as one of the options.

This is the VERY FIRST GAME that I have EVER finished, start to finish. I have planned and started so many games in the past, but I always lost interest before I could finish them. So, I did kind of rush this one--It was made in 2 days. I'm sure it shows in the product. But I really wanted to finish it and I knew that if I took any longer with it I would have lost interest and I had already told my girlfriend that I was making it and I don't want to be like "Hey I'm mkaing this game" "Ok" and then "Nevermind" after less than a week as has happened multiple times before...

Yes there will most likely be issues so if you find issues please tell me so that I may fix them thank You so mucvh.
